Name: Marooned
About the game: Your boat crashed on the deserted tropical island, and you have to escape from it. You need to fix the boat and collect enough food and water. Search for coconuts, mangos, and eggs on the island, look under rocks for scorpions, look on the shore for crabs and clams. Collect firewood to make fire. Fire gives you warmth. Also, you can cook and boil water on fire. Remember, you cannot drink ocean water, and raw water can make you sick; to make it safe, you have to boil it. On the shore, you can find baskets, bottles, fishing lines, and planks. You need planks to fix your boat. Monitor your temperature. Heat and cold make you lose your energy. Sleeping helps restore your energy, but hunger or thirst will make you more tired while your sleeping. Fire gives your warms, going into water cools you down. If you like the idea of simple game mechanics, you may like this game. Try it!
